column1: 271299,Family Law Mediator,,Meet with individuals involved in legal processes to provide information and clarify issues
column3: Arbitrate disputes between parties to resolve legal conflicts
column7: Interview claimants to gather information related to legal proceedings
column9: Rule on admissibility of legal proceedings
column11: Identify implications for cases from legal precedents or other legal information
column15: Evaluate information related to legal matters in public or personal records
column17: Prepare written decisions for legal proceedings
column21: Present social services program information to the public,nan
